title: For Sale:   McDuffee Arms Broadsword, AR 308 Type Rifle
postcontent:
The MLR-308 Broadsword is an AR-308 type (DPMS LR-308 pattern) rifle with numerous upgraded features.
Built on a 7075 aircraft grade billet aluminum lower receiver which features a threaded bolt catch pin, integral winter trigger guard and 'no gap' fit for perfect mating with the upper receiver.

Pictured with Type III mil-spec hard coat anodized lower receiver, also available with NorGuard coated receiver on request.

Featuring a nickel-boron coated bolt carrier group and AR 308 specific heavy buffer for optimal performance. The Broadsword sports a free float modular handguard and 20" stainless steel barrel, providing superb accuracy and excellent handling.

The custom stainless steel muzzle brake, reduces felt recoil to the level of an AR-15 and curtails muzzle rise, allowing the shooter to maintain sight picture within a scope.

Outfitted with a MagPul CTR adjustable stock, Ergo 2 molded ergonomic grip and MagPul PMag for further upgraded handling.

Shooters will experience sub-MOA accuracy out of the box. McDuffee Arms rifles feature a lifetime warranty
    Features Include:

Chambered in .308 Win
Billet aircraft grade aluminum lower (not forged!)
Mil-spec 8625 type III hard coat anodized OR NorGuard nickel-phosphate coating (optional)
8620 steel bolt head and carrier, hardened and MPI tested
Chrome lined bolt carrier and key with nickel-boron finish, staked key

If you want just a factory Glock this is not for you. It has a match grade KKM
precision barrel that was match fitted by KKM to be tighter than a factory Glock, but still have enough play to chew up any ammo you put in it. It has a Zev Tech Fulcrum trigger, a Zev  Tech polished titanium striker, with marine cups and a 6lb. Firing pin spring. I also have the 5lb. And 4lb. Firing pin spring for it. I use the 6lb. Because it's setup as my self defense gun. So the trigger pull is 4lbs. And I left some pre travel in it, but you can adjust it down to 1.5lbs, with no pre travel or after travel. The trigger is super smooth, and breaks very crisp. It also has a tungsten double spring recoil assembly, a Ghost Evo 3.5 lb. connector, 3lb. Trigger spring, and polished titanium safety punger with a reduced power safety plunger spring. It has Trijicon Tritium night sights, and all 3 mags have the +1 Pearce grip extension. All the internals have been polished, and it is in mint condition. This pistol shoots great, and I have never had any malfunctions with it. I have put around 400 rounds through it with about 175 being through the new KKM barrel. I have over $1,200.00 in this gun so please keep that in mind when offering . I don't expect to get a full return on it, but I won't trade it at the value of a stock Glock either, but I will return this one back to a stock Glock, and trade it at normal value.

title: For Sale:  1992 Model PA-2530-SP OshKosh Plow Truck with only 7,400 miles
location: Morris County, New Jersey, United States
postcontent:
1992 Model PA-2530-SP OshKosh Plow Truck with only 7,400 miles (1068 hours.) This truck was formerly owned by the United States military with its authentic "army green" paint job and is in amazing condition. It is powered by a legendary Detroit Diesel Series 60 engine that is a 6 cylinder, 4 stroke motor with 550 horsepower. It is known as the "million mile motor" because you can easily do that millage without any repairs or engine work. The truck has been vigorously maintained as you can see read the numbers on the fan belt and alternator. The truck has an automatic transmission, air brakes, rear wet line, dual side adjustable exterior search lights, heated mirrors, rear mud flaps, permanently mounted tow hooks and auxiliary plow lights on top of the cab. The hydraulic attachments for the plow and wet line are all clean and look new. The interior is extremely clean; the glass windows do not have any cracks or chips, while the seats look brand new, and the headliner is not stained. 

 The truck is 288 inches long, 98" wide and 131.5 inches tall. The curb weight without the plow is 42570 pounds (17900 pounds in the front and 24670 pounds in the rear,) While the truck is very high up, the steps and handles installed make climbing inside very easy. The plow controls are easily accessible and clearly marked. The vent windows are not rusted and open easily. The truck already has a rear trailer hitch installed. 

 This truck has signs of use and wear consistent with its age. The truck is amazingly rust free, however there are some rust spots in the rear of the truck. The main ones to list the suspension springs, brake drums, and where the brackets meet the frame to secure the rear concrete weight. There are also rust spots on the four corners of the rear truck weight. Please see the pictures for the exact condition. The amber plastic cover for the rotating roof warning light is also missing. The tires (size 425/95/R20) have very bad cracks on the side walls and will need to be replaced. 

 This is a unique opportunity to own an automatic plow truck that is a blast to drive. The motor will never give the future owner any issues as these are known to run forever. Please look at the pictures carefully and feel free to ask me any questions.

title: For Sale:  LWRC M6A2 SPR Flat Dark Earth Cerakote AR-15 51T
postcontent:
This is a brand new in box LWRC M6A2 SPR AR-15 semi-automatic rifle with 14.5" barrel. It features a popular and practical Flat Dark Earth cerakote finish. Cerakote is an ultra rugged, high temperature, high performance ceramic coating ideal for firearms use.

The M6A2 rifles edge in capability, reliability, accuracy and long service life is the result of advanced technology materials and manufacturing processes, combined with progressive patented designs. All LWRCI carbine systems feature their short-stroke gas-piston operating system. The operating system is lightweight, self-regulating, and self-scraping. This system of operation does not foul the moving parts of the weapon with carbon or heat, greatly enhancing service life and reliability while decreasing both user and armorer maintenance.

This rifle's 14.7" barrel is Cold Hammer Forged for exceptional longevity and accuracy, and has a popular 1:7" twist rate for stabilizing the heaviest rounds. M6A2 rifles feature a match grade, cold rotary hammer forged barrel with a target crown. The barrel is treated with NiCorr surface conversion technology that extends service life, enhances accuracy, and increases the effective range of the weapon. The barrel is also spiral fluted to reduce weight by 20% and increase heat dispersion. The muzzle is threaded and an AAC 51T Blackout flash hider/suppressor adapter is fitted. The 51T is a clever design that functions effectively as a flash hider, and also allows installation of compatible suppressors in seconds without tools. The 51T is pinned and welded to comply with federal law.

This rifle features a 12" lightweight sculpted quad rail handguard derived from LWRC's REPR platform. As in all of LWRCI's rifles, the bolt carrier group of the M6A2 rifle is coated with EXOs patented nickel-boron surface conversion technology that provides a hard permanent lubrication to the moving parts. The fire control group is also treated with this proprietary nickel coating for exceptional slickness. A B5 SOPMOD adjustable butt stock and MagPul MIAD pistol grip are outfitted to accommodate any operator. 

Caliber: 5.56mm NATO / .223 Remington

Capacity: One 30 round magazine included

Barrel: 14.7" barrel, 1:7"twist

Dimensions: 33.5" - 36.8" long

Weight: ~7.2 pounds

title: For Sale:  2007 Honda 919
postcontent:
Who ever is lucky enough to purchase it will love it too. I'm the original owner. It's never been dropped, and it's always been garage kept. I have taken very good care of my bike. Please do the same.

 If you have any question, please feel free to ask. 


 Thank you for your consideration.

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szvJ-D40hSM&feature=youtu.be

 2007 Honda 919 Features
 Custom Fairing/Windscreen & Rear Removeable seat cowl.
 Currently with BikeMaster Lined Oval mirrors
 Mileage - 5,850

 The 919 is performance motorcycling with its sleeves rolled up--a pared-down, lightweight package ready for any kind of riding you like.

 Features & Benefits 

 Unique features 

 Muscular 919cc open-class engine--inspired by the legendary CBR900RR--pounds out impressive torque and surprising top-end horsepower. 
 A feathery 428-pound dry weight makes the 919 the lightest bike in its class. 
 The comfortable, upright seating position is ideal for commuting, sport riding and long trips. 
 Honda's latest programmed fuel injection (PGM-FI) and electronic digital ignition maximize power output and offer immediate throttle response. 
 Stylish, dual, center-up exhaust exits below the rear cowl. 
 Massive square-tube mono-backbone frame and a large aluminum swingarm combine to provide an ideal balance of rigidity and flexibility for superb road feel. 
 43mm adjustable cartridge front fork, single-shock rear suspension and lightweight cast aluminum three-spoke wheels contribute to exceptional handling. 
 Engine/Drivetrain 

 Compact 919cc DOHC liquid-cooled inline four-cylinder engine is tuned for low-end and mid-range power for spirited acceleration. 
 One-piece upper crankcase/cylinder assembly, right-side cam-drive design and a narrow 32-degree included valve angle help make the 919 engine the lightest, most compact powerplant in its class. 
 The 16-valve cylinder head with a 10.8:1 compression ratio promotes efficient combustion and high horsepower production. 
 Direct shim-under-bucket valve actuation system is compact, ensures high-rpm durability and allows 16,000-mile valve maintenance intervals. 
 High-pressure PGM-FI delivers fuel at 50 psi to four injectors, each mounted in a 36mm throttle body. Fuel is delivered through four nozzle holes in each injector, producing a highly atomized air/fuel charge for maximum combustion efficiency and power. 
 Advanced PGM-FI features a sophisticated throttle sensor and advanced fuel-injection mapping to produce smooth and linear throttle response, responding precisely to fine throttle adjustments. 
 A 16-bit electronic control unit (ECU) provides two digital 3-D fuel-injection maps for each cylinder and one digital 3-D ignition map for cylinder pairs, creating ideal fuel mixture and spark advance settings for superb rideability. 
 Liquid-cooled oil cooler and a lightweight aluminum radiator keep engine temperatures in check for consistent performance and long engine life. 
 Spring-loaded scissors-type gear on the drive side of the crankshaft and a rubber-mounted, floating clutch cover help reduce noise. 
 Weight-saving features include a compact, lightweight one-piece alternator. 
 Unique four-into-two-into-one-into-two exhaust design features expanding-diameter tubing leading into the two center-up mufflers, contributing to strong mid-range torque and an exhilarating exhaust note. Stainless-steel exhaust header and main pipe are attractive and corrosion-resistant. Polished stainless-steel muffler covers shield passenger's legs from muffler heat. 
 High-capacity 380-watt AC generator. 
 Maintenance-free automatic cam-chain tensioner. 
 Smooth-shifting six-speed transmission with gear ratios carefully matched to the engine's powerband. 
 Durable #530 O-ring-sealed drive chain. 
 Chassis/Suspension 

 Massive square-tube mono-backbone steel frame utilizes the engine as a stressed frame member. Together with the reinforced steering head, the chassis provides an optimal balance of rigidity and tuned flex for superb handling. 
 A single box-section downtube reaches to a unique front engine mount that incorporates a cross member to link the frame to the engine's solid front mounts. 
 Lightweight aluminum swingarm features a large one-piece cast pivot block and extruded triple-box-section spars. 
 43mm cartridge front fork with adjustable preload with compression damping and 4.3 inches of travel offers unparalleled rigidity for precise action and excellent handling on a variety of road surfaces. 
 Lightweight aluminum upper triple-clamp adds rigidity for even better steering control. 
 Single-shock rear suspension features a high-quality damper with seven-position-adjustable spring preload, 5.0 inches of plush wheel travel and a remote fluid reservoir for added suspension control in all riding conditions. 
 Braking system features two huge 296mm front discs with four-piston calipers and a 240mm rear disc with a single-piston caliper for exceptional stopping power. 
 Super-light hollow, aluminum-alloy three-spoke wheels with 3.5 x 17-inch front and 5.5 x 17-inch rear dimensions. 
 Additional Features 

 Wide, durable, vinyl-covered seat with thick foam padding provides plush comfort for commuting and two-up day trips. 
 A stylish hugger-type rear fender closely follows the curve of the rear tire. 
 Valve, ignition and clutch covers are black. 
 Gold-colored front and rear brake calipers. 
 Instrumentation includes a clock, digital odometer with two tripmeters, black-face analog speedometer, tachometer, water temperature with white numerals, indicator lights for neutral, FI (fuel injection), oil pressure, low fuel and high beam. 
 A 5-gallon fuel tank is hinged for servicing ease. 
 Aviation-style fuel cap. 
 Engine-mounted manual fuel enricher provides smooth idling speed for cold engine starts. 
 A bank-angle sensor shuts off fuel supply to the PGM-FI system if the motorcycle tips over, but is unaffected by bumps and vibration during normal operation. 
 A large multireflector headlight with a twin-filament H4 low/high beam provides superb road illumination. 
 Maintenance-free battery is lightweight with sufficient starting capacity for all riding seasons. 
 Rugged plastic chip guards on top of the fork sliders protect the front suspension from flying debris. 
 Aluminum passenger grabrail. 
 Convenient ignition switch/fork lock for added security. 
 Handlebar switches and controls use internationally approved ISO graphic symbols.

title: For Sale:  Mauser P-14, Post-WWI Police RE-Issue, Marked         Another Collectible Handgun From Jackson Armory!
postcontent: Mauser 1914, Post-WWI Police RE-Issue, Police-Marked .32. Stock # MMH252510SP. Serial # 248xxx. One of over a thousand Antique and Modern Collectible firearms, including Military, Sporting, Custom and Tactical guns, as well as Edged Weapons and Militaria we have for sale at Jackson Armory (see our other listings), this is a very interesting Mauser Model 1914 .32 semi-auto pistol. Originally a WWI Military Pistol, the gun has added markings that indicate it was re-issued to a German Police Unit in 1920. Specifically, the left side of the slide is stamped 1920 above the standard Mauser markings on the left side of the slide. Also, the WWI Military unit marks have been peened off the front grip strap, and it has been re-stamped S.G. II. 79  this indicates the gun was re-issued to Rrussian Schutzpolezi  Gambinen District (gun # 79)  this was a Protection Police unit

title: For Sale:  WWII era Walther P.38
postcontent:
This is a WWII (Nazi) era Walther P.38.  This is not a post-war P1!  These are chambered in 9mm.  I have had it for over 15 years.  

Pros:  It is fully functional, reliable, and accurate.  Everything works like it should.  It is double action with a right hand safety.  The finish is in great condition, with a nice patina on the grip and trigger guard.

Cons:  Numbers do not match.  The barrel is pitted, but there is still decent rifling.  It shoots very well despite this.  The magazine is not original.  It is stamped "Mexico" and one of the feed lips is mangled, but it still feeds 100%.  The lettering that should be on the slide is worn.  I'm thinking it may have been reblued at some point, but it still matches the grip blueing, so maybe not?  The grip covers are 50s-60s era aftermarket.  They're made by Franzite of Chicago.  Although not original, they're actually collector's pieces as well.  The action spring and spring stud are not original.  They were missing when I got the gun.  I replaced them, but the stud is very loose.  It won't fall out with the spring and grips in place, but could fall out if roughly handled during cleaning.  Something to watch for.

Overall, this is a great piece of history!  It is an amazingly modern handgun for the era.  It even has a "chambered round" indicator, which is shown in the hammer picture.  If you're looking for a historic shooter, or a good sidearm for reenactment, this is it!

$425 FIRM!  Please email me for more pictures!  Thanks for looking!
